description: Video and multi media solutions company
overview:
Dreamtek are a unique video company, offering the full workflow of video solutions from creating your video production â€“ whether its a marketing video, company video, music video or interview. Dreamtek build TV Studios and are very proud to have built the new YouTube creator space at Google’s Central St Giles offices, they can sell the kit, build you a fully bespoke studio or we can supply you with the innovative remote broadcast studio the Broadcastpod.

Dreamtek also specialise in distributing your video content whether you want to stream online, build a bespoke video portal, video blog, run webinars including Adobe Connect and managed Google hangouts. Dreamtek have extensive experience in producing and running live events on and offline and can even help you build apps for Facebook, smart and mobile devices so you can show off your content via any device. Dreamtek can even provide staff to manage your workplace and multi-media or broadcast environment, from support and help desk to fully managed services.

So if you are dealing with video content within your company, get in touch to see if Dreamtek can help.
